page.title: 05FEUGHSIDE FOOTBALL CLUB.
page.content: Feughside Football Club was reformed in 1976 and entered thr Deeside Summer League. After several successful seasons, the club applied for entry to the Aberdeenshire Amateur Football Association.The application accepted, Feughside joined{Division 7}in August 1983. The donation of a field by the local landowner gave us our first permanent ground and many hours were spent by locals ploughing,levelling and re-seeding to create a good playing surface. In the first season of Association football, Feughside gained promotion to Division 6,winning{the Castle Rover {Cup,}competed for by clubs from the seventh division.
